programme.title: Suburban Commando
programme.desc: An intergalactic mercenary comes to Earth to spend a peaceful vacation away from home.

programme.title: For Your Consideration
programme.desc: A documentary crew follows an actor from filming his movie to the Academy Awards in this Hollywood satire.

programme.title: Dark City
programme.desc: Wanted for a series of murders, John Murdoch realizes that everything he believes is a lie.

programme.title: The Little Drummer Girl
programme.desc: Academy Award-winner Diane Keaton stars in a tale of espionage based on John Le Carré's best-selling novel.

programme.title: The Hitman
programme.desc: A cop (Chuck Norris) exacts revenge on those who wronged him by going undercover as a hit man.

programme.title: Moving
programme.desc: Arlo Pear’s dream job in Boise, Idaho, requires his family to do what they dread the most — move.

programme.title: Fandango
programme.desc: Five young men about to graduate from college, take one last trip before facing their lives as adults.

programme.title: Martian Child
programme.desc: Crushed by the death of his fiancée, a writer adopts a boy in a desperate effort to create a family.

programme.title: Osmosis Jones
programme.desc: When a white blood cell cop and a virus clash, zoo worker Frank's life hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Revolution
programme.desc: A Scottish immigrant is forced to choose sides during the American Revolution when his son is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Stand and Deliver
programme.desc: In this true story, a teacher inspires his East Los Angeles high school students into learning calculus.

programme.title: The Stupids
programme.desc: From director John Landis comes a family who puts the dumb back in stupid!

programme.title: True Stories
programme.desc: David Byrne whimsically pays homage to the mythical small Texas town of Virgil.

programme.title: The Year of Living Dangerously
programme.desc: A reporter suddenly rockets to importance after he gains access to inside information about a coup.
